text: Raymond Claude "Ray" Moreton (30 January 1942 – 20 July 2016) was a New Zealand rugby union player. A second five-eighth and centre, Moreton represented and at a provincial level. He was a member of the New Zealand national side, the All Blacks, from 1962 to 1965, playing in 12 matches including seven internationals, and scoring seven tries and one drop goal in all. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Rugby union players from Invercargill Category:People educated at Southland Boys' High School Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:New Zealand international rugby union players Category:Southland Stags players Category:Canterbury rugby union players Category:Rugby union centres
title: Ray Moreton
